question.title: Android studio 24.1.1: window 11: Error running app, The emulator process for AVD Pixel_8_Pro_Api_35 terminated
question.body:
I couldn't find a solution. Can someone help me to understand the issue and fix it?

I am attaching log files also

I did try some of suggestions provided in youtube videos such as:

  1. clearing the memory
  2. updating exclusion list
  3. enabling/disabling hyper driver in turn window feature on -off options
  4. there is NO hyper-V options in my PC
  5. deleting all the data and installing from sratch again but still face same issue.
  6. installed JAVA but that did not help

Please someone check for the error in above logs and let me if it is relevant here. also please suggest me the solutions for this.
